JDF.xsd

This schema is valid for JDF 1.3
JDF 1.1 and JDF 1.2 can be validated with this schema
with the restriction that elements that are new in a higher version 
will not be flagged as prerelease. 
Nonetheless all valid JDF 1.1 and JDF 1.2 files MUST validate with the JDF 1.3 schema.

A detailed change log can be found at the CIP4 Jira:
http://www.cip4.org/jira/browse/SCH
